attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cut Legal Aid

Do citizens of England and Wales getter better justice than the rest of the world or richer lawyers?   At a time when we are talking about cutting back on the health service and education lawyers are getting richer and richer.

The legal aid bill for England and Wales is the highest in the world. 

Legal aid costs had risen from £138m in 1980 to £2.2bn two years ago. 

In England and Wales £34 was spent per head on legal aid, compared with £10 in New Zealand, £7 in the Irish Republic, £4 in Germany, £3 in France and £1 in Sweden.
